title: Jobs at Art Museums (JAM 2022): Learning and Public Engagement
short_description: Meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine.
header_description: JAM is a unique opportunity for college students to make professional connections and learn about careers in the museum field.
list_description: Meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine.
description:
Meet staff whose work connects visitors to art and inspires them to question, confront, and imagine. 

Speakers:
Ayana Chavis, Senior Educator, Youth and Family

Sam Ramos, Interim Director, Innovation and Creativity

Allison Muscolino, Educator of Innovation and Creativity, Learning and Public Engagement

Participation by museum staff and departments does not indicate a need to hire. Staff will not be accepting resumes or offering interviews. For questions, email universitypartners@artic.edu.
